rdf:Description.dc:title: American white pelican, California gull, caspian tern, double-crested cormorant, great blue heron and ring-billed gull colony surveys : Alberta 1998. Volume 1, Report (with 1999 update) 2000 Alberta 1998.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Environment.
Cottonwood Consultants Ltd.
North American Water Fowl Management Plan.
Alberta Conservation Association.
rdf:Description.dc:description: "This document is the first volume of a two-volume report. Volume 2 contains the colony location maps. Due to the sensitive nature of colonial nesters to disturbance, these maps will be provided to Regional Endangered Species Specialists and Wildlife Biologists in the Natural Resources Service Area offices, and detailed information will be available on demonstrated need" -- [p.i.].
"Funded by: Alberta North American Waterfowl Management Plan; Alberta Environment; Alberta Conservation Association" -- cover.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Waterfowl management
Waterfowl
White pelican.
California gull.
Caspian tern.
Double-crested cormorant.
Great blue heron.
Ring-billed gull.
